Name: Castle Cardians
About the game: Cardian Continent was a peaceful land, but the arrival of the Dark Legion broke the tranquility. As the leader, you need to lead your people to gather resources to build your homeland, recruit brave warriors to repel the constant flood of monsters. ◆Rich Content ▸4 Themes and 7 Levels ▸3 Leaders ▸162 Cards ▸11 Teams ▸20 Enchants ▸40 Masteries ▸65 Relics ◆Epic Battle ▸Deploy your army, hold the last line！ ▸Cast mighty spells, beat the monsters! ◆Rich Strategy ▸Choose from large card pool, build your powerful deck. ▸Combine with Relics,Enchants and Masteries. ◆Unique Teams ▸Pick fighters from 11 teams. ▸Personalize fighters through enchanting. ◆Exciting levels ▸Complete different missions in Adventure Mode. ▸Compete with global players in Daily Mode.
